channel.title: Why are my teleport spells still black even whe it doesen't require runes?
channel.description:
So I got my teleport spells free. 0 runes but they still appear black in my magic list... they won't appear bold and color.
Here is the picture [img]http://img211.imageshack.us/img211/6458/magicre6.png[/img]
This is on the dodian source, any ideas?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2008, 01:26:04 AM[/size][hr]anyone know?
